ref.mixed-citation: Jarić, S., Mitrović, M., Pavlović, P., 2014. An ethnobotanical and ethnomedicinal study on the use of wild medicinal plants in rural areas of Serbia. In: Pieroni, A., Quave, C.L. (Eds.), Ethnobotany and Biocultural Diversities in the Balkans: Perspectives on Sustainable Rural Development and Reconciliation. Springer, New York, pp. 87–111.
